first_para: Mark Phillip Hendrick (born 2 November 1958) is a British Labour Co-operative politician. He previously represented the Central Lancashire seat as a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from 1994–1999. Since winning a by-election in 2000, Hendrick has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Preston. He also serves as a member of the Foreign Affairs Select Committee.

full.extract: Mark Phillip Hendrick (born 2 November 1958) is a British Labour Co-operative politician. full.title: Mark Hendrick
